name: Mars Loops
description:
Mars Loops

A deadly virus is spreading across the earth. You’ve heard that a group of scientists on the planet Mars had just found an antidote! Unfortunately something happened up there and they can’t be reached anymore. Even the teleporteur seems to have been damaged and only allows you to exit its platform for 30 seconds. Can you go produce the antidote and save the earth??

Controls
- Arrow keys: To move
- Space: To interact with objects
- Esc: To close books
